name: Freelance Income
description: Income from freelance projects or side jobs.

name: Investment Income
description: Income generated from investments (e.g., dividends, interest).

name: Bank Interest
description: Interest earned from savings accounts or investments.

name: Groceries
description: Monthly expenses for food and household supplies.

name: Utilities
description: Expenses for utilities like electricity, water, gas, etc.

name: Rent/Mortgage
description: Monthly rent or mortgage payment for housing.

name: Transportation
description: Expenses related to transportation, including gas, car payments, or public transit.

name: Entertainment
description: Spending on leisure activities like movies, dining out, etc.

name: Medical
description: Expenses related to healthcare and medical bills.

name: Debt Repayment
description: Payments toward credit card or loan debt.

name: Savings
description: Monthly savings contribution to a bank account or investment fund.

name: Taxes
description: Income tax payments or other tax-related expenses.
